name: WorldAdventure
description:
| WorldAdventure |

It's a platform game, you must catch the gems, every 5 gems a monster will be spawn! Try to make as many point as possible!

If you are playing from pc you can play with the arrows (but there aren't animation for left or right)

This is my second game and I hope you enjoy it!

- Michele Zanetti [DeathShadow]
